17.10: The first-born of a donkey is prohibited in benefit. But R. Shimon permits.
17.51: R. Shimon agrees that after its neck is broken it is prohibited to derive benefit from it.
17.52: What is his reasoning? He derives "breaking its neck" from "breaking its neck" connected to the heifer whose neck is broken.
17.8: With whom does the Mishnah accord?
17.9: It is R. Judah, as it is taught
